# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ViSUS)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ViSUSPluginInfo.C
ViSUSCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
ViSUSPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
ViSUSMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtViSUSFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ViSUSEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtViSUSFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${VISUS_INCLUDE_DIR} 
)


LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${VISUS_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IViSUSDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IViSUSDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IViSUSDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MViSUSDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MViSUSDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${VISUS_LIB} -lz )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(MViSUSDatabase
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DMDSERVER"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MViSUSDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EViSUSDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EViSUSDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${VISUS_LIB} -lz )
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EViSUSDatabase_ser
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EViSUSDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EViSUSDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EViSUSDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${VISUS_LIB} -lz )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EViSUSDatabase_par
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EViSUSDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})

VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_PREFIX(${INSTALLTARGETS})
